// Pseudo-code example:

form.form-inline
  .form-group
    label
    input.form-control
  .form-group
    label
    input.form-control
  button.btn.btn-default
/form

Inline form without a checkbox

                
// Pseudo-code example:

form.form-inline
    .form-group
        label
        input.form-control
    .form-group
        label
        input.form-control
    .checkbox
        label
            input
  button.btn.btn-default
/form

Inline form with a checkbox
